name: github
description: GitHub CI/CD automation plugin for auto-detecting, analyzing, and fixing CI/CD failures on any branch

fix-ci.description: Auto-detect, analyze, and fix CI/CD failures on any branch

create-pr.description: Create GitHub Pull Request with proper formatting and context

address-pr-comments.description: Interactive or autonomous PR comment resolution with confidence scoring

review-pr.description: Comprehensive PR review with detailed analysis and actionable feedback

ci-log-analyzer.description: Specialized agent for parsing CI logs and identifying error patterns

ci-error-fixer.description: Specialized agent for applying fixes based on CI error types
